content:
Asha lives at $2^{\text{nd}}$ Avenue and $11^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by the point $(2,11)$ on the map below.  She and her sister decide to walk to the ice cream shop at $5^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and $4^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by $(5, 4)$ on the map.  They head down $2^{\text{nd}}$ Avenue then over on $4^{\text{th}}$ Street. 

**Plot Asha's home and the ice cream shop on the map.** 

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**How many blocks do they walk to get to the ice cream shop?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] blocks
